about_the_game:
Please note that this is the second episode in the episodic visual novel National Park Girls. As such, it requires purchasing the base game in order to play through it.

National Park Girls - Episode 2: Happy Trails is the second installment in the episodic visual novel National Park Girls. Join park ranger Eve Aadams as she goes on a (reluctant) hike with Yellowstone, learns more about the girls' origins, and causes the end of western civilization!



All Eve ever wanted was to protect and preserve the land, but after five years of being a ranger in Yosemite National Park, she’s just about ready to throw in the towel. The people are careless, her co-workers are annoying, and thanks to an increasingly tight budget she can hardly do her job. Fed up and burned out, Eve lashes out, but after being transferred to a remote cabin post in return, she only finds herself more uncertain of the value of being a ranger. Soon after arriving, three strange girls corner her in the cabin. Not only do they claim to live there, but they also say they’re the manifestations of Zion, Yellowstone, and Yosemite National Parks! Are these girls really who they say they are? Why is Yosemite so obsessed with her research? And why does one of them have a volcano on their head? Follow Eve as she gets closer with these spritely cuties that put the “natural” in “supernatural,” and maybe even discovers a new kind of love for the parks.



  • Multiple episodes to enjoy! (Please note only four episodes are available at this time!)
  • Adorable character art and CG art from Satchely!
  • Gallery to view CG art and guest art
  • A wonderful original soundtrack
  • FULL English voice acting!
  • National Parks come to life as cute girls!

content_descriptors.notes: National Park Girls - Episode 2: Happy Trails features several instances of coarse language as well as one instance of violence and limited amounts of of blood.

fullgame.name: National Park Girls: Love Our Parks Edition

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any distribution built for x86 or x64 processors
  • Processor: 1 GHz Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or later
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo or newer
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any OpenGL graphics card capable of running Mac OS X 10.6 or later
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7 or later
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM

movies.name: National Park Girls - Episode 2: Happy Trails

name: National Park Girls - Episode 2: Happy Trails

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1 GHz Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL or DirectX Compatible Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or above
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080 display
